education.institution: Turing School of Software and Design

highlights: Lead rebranding effort of major product from approval to release.
Advised PO to provide roadmap for frontend improvements, tech debt, and accessibility efforts.
Hand chosen to be single full time infra and full stack effort creating internal tool in react.
Provide Architecture support and guidance for multiple teams across several contracts.
Set up a new projects architecture on Defense Intelligence Information Enterprise ahead of schedule.
Implemented SonarQube scanning on several projects to drastically improve code quality and reliability.
Volunteered to take on role of DevOps for the company. Transitioned architecture from monolithic codebase into containerized micro-services with full CI/CD pipelines.
Lead development of better state management on front-end by setting up immutable store services.
Improved teams development processes. Implemented coding guidelines and global linting rules as well as a revised pull request process to include code review.
Advanced teams professional development. Implement lightning talks every week to allow team members to share subject matter expert knowledge with the team while developing public speaking skills.

projects.name: Leaderboard
projects.description: Built for a client that wanted a dynamic leaderboard system for smaller sporting events that updates in realtime to score changes. Also displays media of current run when there is an update.

projects.name: Devs Give Back
projects.description: devsGIVEback is a platform to connect non-developers with developers. Those out there that have an issue that can be solved by software can meet developers that are willing to volunteer their time and skill to solve civic-minded problems or issues that affect large groups of people.
